inspirational.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

inspirational.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
inspirational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

happy.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
happy.author: Dalai Lama

happy.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
happy.author: Mark Twain

sad.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
sad.author: Leonardo da Vinci

sad.quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
sad.author: Charles Dickens
